PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PumpTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Common attributes of a pump type.

PropertyDef.Name: FlowRateRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable range of volume of fluid being pumped against the resistance specified.

PropertyDef.Name: FlowResistanceRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable range of frictional resistance against which the fluid is being pumped

PropertyDef.Name: ConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: The connection size of the to and from the pump

PropertyDef.Name: CasingMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Material from which the casing of the pump is constructed

PropertyDef.Name: ImpellerMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Material from which the impeller of the pump is constructed. In the case of a positive displacement pump, the piston acts as the impeller

PropertyDef.Name: ImpellerSealMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Material from which the impeller shaft seal of the pump is constructed.

PropertyDef.Name: TemperatureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable operational range of the fluid temperature.

PropertyDef.Name: NetPositiveSuctionHead
PropertyDef.Definition: Minimum liquid pressure at the pump inlet to prevent cavitation.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalRotationSpeed
PropertyDef.Definition: Pump rotational speed under nominal conditions.
